page.title: 10EARDINGTON MANOR SHROPSHIRE
page.content: { Eardington Manor}was built in 1790 and had 10 acres of ground.It is now a GRADE TWO{listed building. The seven of us who visited the house and spoke to the owner were amazed by the sheer size of the building.The idea of a private house having 24 rooms and a swimming pool was to us staggering. The house has a large cellar,of several rooms,which floods when the R.Severn rises.Nowadays there is an electrical pump which automatically empties the cellar. During excavation for the swimming pool over 100 Victorian bottles,jars and a china doll were unearthed. Several years ago an extension was added in the same style as the original building.The house is in good condition and provided an interesting visit.
